# What NEW Keyword Does

Posted: 09.23.2019

#JS Basics #Interview Problems

# Description

What underlying process has been gone through for the following code?

var a = new B();

# Create Empty Object

  1. Create an empty object a
var a = {};

# Inherit prototype

  1. Set B's prototype to a's __proto__
a.__proto__ = B.prototype;

# Call constructor

  1. Call B's constructor with this points to a (change binding)
B.call(a);
// same as: B.prototype.constructor.call(a);

# In A Whole

function B () {
  this.name = 'lynch';
}

// var a = new B();
var a = {};
a.__proto__ = B.prototype;
B.call(a); 
// same as: B.prototype.constructor.call(a);

// will log B {name: "lynch"}
console.log(a);

# Reference

js中的new()到底做了些什么？
